info.title: Qiy Node API
info.description: RESTful API documentation of the [Qiy Node API](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/Qiy%20Node%20Protocol.md#qiy-node-api).

license.name: Qiy Foundation License for the Qiy Scheme

id.description: [Qiy Node Id](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/Qiy%20Node%20Protocol.md#qiy-node-id). This property is only included when the request is authenticated.

actions.description: Instructions to be executed immediately after connecting.

identifier.description: This property is only used in responses and holds the alias.

items.description: Audit log entry with Service Provider confirmations.

changeRecorded.description: Creation time of the audit log entry.

confirmationRecorded.description: Record time of the confirmation in this audit log entry.

confirmationSignature.description: Confirmation signature by the Service Provider over the consentId, the old status, the new status, the changeTime and the confirmationTime.

consentRequestSignature.description: Signature of the Service Provider over the consentId, dataTypeUrl, publishedServiceUrl, consentRequestedTime and persistentId.

dataTypeUrl.description: The Personal Data that the Service Provider requests Consent for (dataTypeUrl).

persistentId.description: Persistent Id of the connection between the Relying Party and the Individual.

publishedServiceUrl.description: The Service that the Service Provider intends to use the Personal Data for (publishedServiceUrl).

consentRequestSignature.description: Signature of the Service Provider over the consentId, dataTypeUrl, publishedServiceUrl, consentRequestedTime and persistentId.

dataTypeUrl.description: The Personal Data that the Service Provider requests Consent for (dataTypeUrl).

persistentId.description: Persistent Id of the connection between the Relying Party and the Individual.

publishedServiceUrl.description: The Service that the Service Provider intends to use the Personal Data for (publishedServiceUrl).

DataServiceUrlModel.description: Data Descriptor of the Data Service that will serve as the source for the Personal Data (publishedServiceUrl).

consumedBy.description: Service Types and Service Providers that consume data of this type.

serviceTypes.description: Service Types that consume data of this type.

items.description: Service Type that consumes data of this type (serviceTypeUrl).

serviceProviders.description: Service Providers that consume data of this type.

items.description: Service Provider that consumes data of this type (publishedProviderUrl).

producedBy.description: Service Types and Service Providers that produce data of this type.

serviceTypes.description: Service Types that produce data of this type.

items.description: Service Type that produces data of this type (serviceTypeUrl).

serviceProviders.description: Service Providers that produce data of this type.

items.description: Service Provider that produces data of this type (publishedProviderUrl).

connections.description: Current address for the 'connections'-endpoint (connectionsEndpoint). This property is only included when the request is authenticated.

create.description: Current address for the 'create'-endpoint (createEndpoint). This property is only included when the request is not authenticated.

ctCreate.description: Current address for the 'connect token create'-endpoint (ctCreateEndpoint). This property is only included when the request is authenticated.

ctList.description: Current address for the 'connect token list'-endpoint (ctListEndpoint). This property is only included when the request is authenticated.

delete.description: Current address for the 'delete'-endpoint (deleteEndpoint). This property is only included when the request is authenticated.

events.description: Current address for the 'events'-endpoint (eventsEndpoint). This property is only included when the request is authenticated.

library.description: Current address for the 'library'-endpoint (libraryEndpoint). This property is only included when the request is authenticated.

portfolio.description: Current address for the 'portfolio'-endpoint (portfolioEndpoint). This property is only included when the request is authenticated.

ref.description: Current address for the 'reference'-endpoint (refEndpoint). This property is only included when the request is authenticated.

refs.description: Current address for the 'references'-endpoint (refsEndpoint). This property is only included when the request is authenticated.

Link.description: Link header parameter, containing the mailbox url for the connection.

inbound.description: Whether the received message is inbound or outbound.

payload.description: The Base64-encoded payload of the message.

extraData.description: extra data: Persistent Ids and Service Provider Identity.

consumes.description: Data Types that the Service Provider consumes.

produces.description: Data Types that the Service Provider consumes.

providerDescription.description: External documentation about the Service Provider.

operationApi.description: Link to the API for the Operation as provided by the Service Provider (operationApiUrl).

ReferenceResultModel.description: Result of the Operation Execute Request.

value.description: Return value of the Service Endpoint, accessed immediately after the request.

consumes.description: Data Types that the service consumes.

produces.description: Data Types that the service produces.

SourceUrlModel.description: Data Source for the Personal Data (sourceUrl).

authorizationParam.name: Authorization
authorizationParam.format: QTF [Qiy Node id] [Unix time in ms]:[signature]

authorizationOptionalParam.name: Authorization
authorizationOptionalParam.format: QTF [Qiy Node id] [Unix time in ms]:[signature]

sinceParam.name: since
sinceParam.description: Limit results to period after date=time stamp 'since'.

200.description: 200 Successful execution.

204.description: A response code 204 (NO CONTENT) will indicate a success.

400.description: Failures will be indicated with response codes 400 to but-not-including 600.

200.description: The status code of a success response will be 200.
The status code of a success response will be 200.

get.description: Get api information and current endpoint addresses. Use this request daily to remain operational, see [Dynamic Path Endpoint Addresses](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/Qiy%20Node%20Protocol.md#dynamic-path-endpoint-addresses) for more information.

200.description: Successfull response
The status code of a success response will be 200.
The status code of a success response will be 200.
The status code of a success response will be 200.

204.description: A response code 204 (NO CONTENT) will indicate a success.

400.description: Failures will be indicated with response codes 400 to but-not-including 600.

200.description: The status code of a success response will be 200.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Limit results to [Connections](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/Qiy%20Node%20Protocol.md#connection) that have been active since the time stamp 'since'.

parameters.name: persistentId
parameters.description: Limit result to [Connection](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/Qiy%20Node%20Protocol.md#connection) with a [Persistent Id](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/Qiy%20Node%20Protocol.md#persistent-id) equaling 'persistentId'.

200.description: The status code of a success response will be 200.

204.description: A response code 204 (NO CONTENT) will indicate a success.

400.description: Failures will be indicated with response codes 400 to but-not-including 600.

200.description: The status code of a success response will be 200.

post.description: See [Connect Token Create Request](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/Qiy%20Node%20Protocol.md#connect-token-create-request) or [Connect Token Register Request](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/Qiy%20Node%20Protocol.md#connect-token-register-request).

201.description: The status code of a success response will be 201 Created.

Location.description: The Connect Token Url of the generated token, see /connectTokenUrl.
